book_overview.premise: Ten-year-old Kai Begay, growing up on an Arizona reservation, crafts under the stars but struggles to infer main ideas from reading. With 2025 AI stargazing kits blending tech and tradition, Kai infers narratives like weaving tapestries, turning frustration into celestial mastery. Set on vast desert nights and a starry loom realm, with a twist of culturally fused tales, Kai not only comprehends deeply but shares inferred wisdom with his community, crafting a luminous path of cultural pride and literacy triumph.
